title: Art View 2.0 – Enhanced Quick Look support for Adobe Creative Suite and Cloud
content: Art View: Quick Look enhancement for Creative Suite and Creative Cloud.    Download and launch Art View. Suddenly your graphics files’ Quick Look previews come to life. title: Timing 1.8.1 – Discover how you spend time on your Mac
content: Timing is the best way to keep track of the time you spend with your Mac. Find out where your time goes — without ever having to start a timer again!   Timing automatically tracks which documents you are editing, which applications you use, and the domains of the websites you visit. title: StellarDriveDefrag 3.0 – Defragment meta data in a disk volume
content: StellarDriveDefrag is here to help you systematize the fragmented data and free space in the Mac volumes. The software gathers the fragmented data of a file and stores together into a single chunk of memory, which makes the data access speed faster.   Features Defrags the meta-data files in a volume. title: Aragami – Assassin Masks 1.0 – A third person action & adventure stealth game

title: Badia BigPicture for InDesign 8.0.0 – Manage graphics and picture links in Adobe InDesign
content: Badia BigPicture for InDesign gives you the most comprehensive solution for managing graphics and picture links in Adobe InDesign.
